title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies Applying Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Foundational Pedagogy Understanding
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between types of cognitive load (intrinsic/extraneous/germane) and apply them to math problems
Learners can optimize instructional materials by applying cognitive load theory principles in math education design
Learners can analyze the impact of cognitive load management strategies on learners' problem-solving abilities through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
